name: Flap 4 Your Life
description:
*Peck *Peck** That's what birds do right? Well all of a sudden you hear a BOOM!!! RUN (or flap) THE VOLCANO HAS EXPLODED!!!

Arrow keys to move

WASD to move

W or Up arrow to jump

Yellow birds boost you

Boulders push you back

Don't touch the lava!!

This infinite runner game was made for the 72 hour MiniJam99: Birds with the limitation "Can't stop moving"

All assets are original made in Unity in under 72 hours.

Dev time: ~30-35 hours
